name: v0.10.3
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.10.3 -->

## What's Changed
### ✨ Enhancements
* Provide typing for serialized ActiveRecord columns by @robthornton in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1194
* Show error and fail early for unknown options by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1208
* Add guides to rbis by @adisonlampert in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1228
### 🛠 Other Changes
* Add release workflow by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1195
* Use correct type for `GraphQL::Types::ISO8601DateTime` by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1196
* Update RBI gem and fix tests by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1211
* Start testing against Ruby 3.2 by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1214
* Fix code making additions to only the singleton class of a constant in the payload by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1213
* Add explanation in readme what ConstantType is for by @bdewater in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1201
* Add missing bundle install in test by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1216
* Filter ActiveSupport `String` extensions in tests by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1215
* Remove Travis CI mention in `dev.yml` by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1219
* Silence warnings in all CLI output by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1218
* Add option for generating RBIs for Rails engines by @andyw8 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1220
* Upgrade Sorbet to 0.5.10486 by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1227
* Improve DSL test for custom `app_root` by @andyw8 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1225
* dev: clean up Gemfile.lock platforms by @flavorjones in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1239
* Drop `pry` as a runtime dependency by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1259
* Protobuf DSL: generate namespaced enum constants on root by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1267

## New Contributors
* @robthornton made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1194
* @bdewater made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1201
* @andyw8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1220
* @flavorjones made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1239

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.3

name: v0.10.2
body:
## What's Changed
### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Correct set_color's usage by @st0012 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1171
* Disable trackers in commands that don't need them by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1190
* Various performance optimizations for trackers by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1188
### 🛠 Other Changes
* Generate the right signature for generics with fixed type members by @rafaelfranca in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1151
* Minor fix to documentation of Protobuf compiler by @bmalinconico in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1092
* Handle constants with nil value by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1148
* Update `fixture_names` type to include `String` by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1161
* Document the reason for keeping find untyped by @richard-thatch in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1160
* Start matching pathname directory prefixes more rigorously by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1175
* Prevent failure when using generic interfaces in constant assignments. by @amanda-mitchell in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1152
* Fix issue with Tapioca DSL hanging by @dirceu in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1179
* Fix rubocop-rspec dependencies by @dirceu in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1180
* README: Fix typo by @issyl0 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1183
* Only load GraphQL compilers for versions >= 1.13 by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1184

## New Contributors
* @bmalinconico made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1092
* @richard-thatch made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1160
* @amanda-mitchell made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1152
* @issyl0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1183

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.2

## What's Changed

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Update `fixture_names` type to include `String` by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1161

name: v0.10.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.10.0 -->

## What's Changed
`v0.10.0` includes enhancements made since `v0.9.2` release and all the bugfixes that were previously made available in `v0.9.x` versions.
### ✨ Enhancements
* Make `--workers` option not experimental by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1069
* Load DSL compilers from gems by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1075
* Generate enum module definitions by @georgebrock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1079
* Add flag to list compilers for DSL command by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1113
* Use a custom URI class to handle source location comments by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1094
* DSL compiler for graphql-ruby mutations and input objects by @jeffcarbs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1038
### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Fix help URL for empty gem RBI files by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1070
* Also check duplicated mixins in shims and TODO files by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1077
* Disable TracePoints when running the check-shims command by @rafaelfranca in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1082
* Thor: Love (❤️ ) and Thunder (⚡) by @rafaelfranca in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1083
* Don't crash on rails < 7 by @fsateler in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1074
* Update Protobuf DSL Readme by @gaborszakacs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1093
* Properly discover methods added to `<main>` object by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1102
* Fix failures against Rails `main` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1110
* Report Rails load errors and continue generating by @KaanOzkan in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1087
* New approach to finding attached class by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1098
### 🛠 Other Changes
* Make ActiveRecord#find return value typed by @gaborszakacs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1089
* Generate enum module definitions, and use symbols as then return value for methods which get/set enums by @shidel-dev in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/607
* Bump yard-sorbet by @dduugg in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1134
* Revert "Bump sorbet-static-and-runtime from 0.5.10326 to 0.5.10370" by @KaanOzkan in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1137

## New Contributors
* @rafaelfranca made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1082
* @gaborszakacs made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1093
* @dirceu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1112
* @georgebrock made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1079
* @shidel-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/607

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.9.2...v0.10.0

name: v0.9.4
body:
## What's Changed

The v0.9.3 release was a bit strange, since it was released with a subset of features from 0.9.0-0.9.2, instead of adding bugfixes on top of those versions. So this release lists all the changes since 0.9.2 instead.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Fix help URL for empty gem RBI files by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1070
* Don't crash on rails < 7 by @fsateler in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1074
* Check duplicated mixins in shims and TODO files by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1077
* Disable TracePoints when running the check-shims command by @rafaelfranca in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1082
* Thor: Love (❤️ ) and Thunder (⚡) by @rafaelfranca in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1083
* Report Rails load errors and continue generating by @KaanOzkan in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1087
* Update Protobuf DSL Readme by @gaborszakacs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1093
* New approach to finding attached class by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1098
* Properly discover methods added to `<main>` object by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1102
* Fix failures against Rails `main` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1110

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.9.2...v0.9.4

name: v0.9.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.9.1 -->

## What's Changed

### ✨ Enhancements

* Parallelize RBI parsing to speed up the `check-shims` command by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1056
* Add original gem source location to RBIs by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1025
* Add enum column support to `ActiveRecordColumns` by @q3aiml in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1000
* Track class new in ConstantDefinition by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1044
* Include excluded gems in verify logic by @adisonlampert in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1058

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Fix method name validation edge-case by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1045
* Do not index files typed: ignore when running `check-shims` by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1054
* Do not remove final newlines from annotations by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1059

### 🛠 Other Changes

* Upgrade Ruby LSP to v0.2.0 by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1043
* Remove `T.unsafe` from extension method call by @sambostock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1047

## New Contributors

* @q3aiml made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1000
* @sambostock made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1047
* @adisonlampert made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1058

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.9.0...v0.9.1

name: v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed

### 🚧 Breaking Changes

* Make `tapioca init` behave like `srb init` by @Morriar & @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1026

### ✨ Enhancements

* Use `--config` and `--postrequire` when calling the `init` command by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/957
* Handle multiple annotations repositories by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/955
* Add `--environment` flag to `dsl`/`gem` commands by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/979
* Support authentication for private annotations repositories by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/963
* Check-shims command also look inside the sorbet/rbi/annotations directory by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/991
* Read private repo credentials from a the `netrc` file by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/990
* Also check `sorbet/rbi/todo.rbi` for duplicated shims when running the `check-shims` command by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/992
* Add `--typed-overrides` option to the annotations command by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/999
* Provide a meaningful help for HTTP errors when fetching annotations by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1008
* Compile RBIs for foreign constants by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/903
* Properly attribute mixin locations by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1010
* Filter out mixins that weren't performed in current gem by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1012
* Disable mixin tracking when we do includes for probing by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1019
* Support for `activerecord-typedstore` v1.5.0 by @etiennebarrie in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/976

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Fix type variable patch to respect references to late defined types by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/944
* Skip `debug` and `fakefs` gems by @st0012 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/947
* Better name validation for methods and parameters by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/987
* Fix type of `column_type` parameter for `handle_unknown_type` method by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/997
* Filter engines in application directory so they are not loaded by @wildmaples in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/995
* Dsl::Compilers::ActiveRecordRelations: fix #find_sole_by, #sole by @kivikakk in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1007
* Use default Gemfile path instead of Rails root when listing engines by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1018
* Fix Rails engine symbol loading by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1028
* Do not mark constants as seen before generating RBI for them by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1040
* Fix command documentation for check-shims by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/956
* Protobuf: Initializer, getter and setter for optional fields with message subtype should be nilable by @andrewn617 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/966
* ActiveModel DateTime Attribute is a Time, not a DateTime by @louissobel in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1036
* Use `T.untyped` safe nilability by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1035

### 🛠 Other Changes

* Improve README documentation about `tapioca gem --all` by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/954
* Fix typo in README by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/953
* Generate the `help` block from the README by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/958
* Refactor the `interesting_ancestors_of` method in the mixins listener by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/967
* Upgrade Ruby LSP to 0.0.4 by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/975
* Ensure test project cleanup by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1024
* Add line numbers to the ConstantDefinition tracker by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1029

## New Contributors

* @st0012 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/947
* @wildmaples made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/995
* @kivikakk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1007
* @louissobel made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/1036

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

This release includes a bug fix to filter engines defined in the application's directory so that they are not loaded during gem RBI generation.

Filter engines in application directory so they are not loaded https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/995

name: v0.8.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.8.1 -->

## What's Changed

This is a small bug-fix release that changes how Tapioca does backward compatible `type_member`/`type_template` processing so that it respects references to not-yet-declared types in the blocks passed to those methods.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Fix type variable patch to respect references to late defined types by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/944

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.7.3 -->

## What's Changed

This is a small bug-fix release that changes how Tapioca does backward compatible `type_member`/`type_template` processing so that it respects references to not-yet-declared types in the blocks passed to those methods.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Fix type variable patch to respect references to late defined types by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/944

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.7.2...v0.7.3

name: v0.8.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.8.0 -->

## What's Changed

This release is aimed at removing some of the pain points of working with Tapioca. Towards that goal, the headline features added are:
- Tapioca now automatically checks and corrects RBI strictness to work around mismatched method definitions. This allows you to not have to reach for `typed_overrides` manually.
- Tapioca now requires gems from the `Gemfile` that are marked as `require: false` as well. This allows you to not have to add a lot of entries to the `require.rb` file manually.
- Tapioca now generates a `sorbet/config` file which ignores `vendor/` directory.
- Tapioca now generates the documentation of methods/constants in the generated RBI file by default.
- Tapioca now allows you to check your shim RBI files against gem/DSL RBIs **and** Sorbet payload RBIs to find shim definitions that are no longer needed.
- Tapioca now includes a prototype of the `annotate` command to fetch signature/type annotation RBI files from remote sources. This command is in its early stages and will be improved in future releases, but we would love to hear what you think about it.

We also have an updated README, a cute new logo and documentation for how to create your own DSL compilers. 🎉 

### ✨ Enhancements
* Prototype: Add `annotations` command by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/930
* Check generated RBI files for correctness by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/842
* Make DSL generation also autocorrect the gems RBI strictnesses by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/837
* Need less entries in `require.rb` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/818
* Set default if `factory` prop is set by @jeffcarbs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/833
* Add `tapioca/dsl` entrypoint for custom DSL compilers by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/844
* Always ignore the `vendor/` directory form the sorbet/config by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/848
* Check duplicates between shims and Sorbet's RBI payload by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/879
* Fairer queueing for parallel workers in RBI generation by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/889
* Validate config values for arrays and hashes by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/898
* More effectively determine method ownership for RBI generation by @egiurleo in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/896
* Add descriptive message for unexpected DSL exceptions by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/913
* Enable documentation generation by default by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/920
* Add support for :oneof fields on protobuf messages by @andrewn617 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/929

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Explicitly load descendants patch in ActiveSupport by @KaanOzkan in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/924

### 🛠 Other Changes
* Improve README by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/917
* Add README entry for creating custom DSL compilers by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/921

## New Contributors
* @egiurleo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/889
* @andrewn617 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/929

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.7.2...v0.8.0

name: v0.7.2

* Avoid generating syntax errors for capitalized protobuf fields by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/878
* Bump spoom to v1.1.11 by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/886
* Bump `rubocop-sorbet` to v0.6.8 by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/910

name: v0.7.1
body:
## What's Changed

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Fix generic type variable argument serialization by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/839
* Do not crash when trying to generate DSL RBIs on non-rails apps by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/847
* Update `tapioca todo` to handle constants defined in `class << self` by @jeffcarbs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/850
* Bump rbi to v0.0.14 by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/866
* Start filtering old copies of reloaded constants by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/869
* Fix block with no param generation by @pjambet in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/874
* Start using compared by identity Set operations for `UrlHelpers#includes_helper?` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/877

## New Contributors

* @pjambet made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/874

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1

name: v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed

### 🚧 Breaking Changes

* Replace `clean-shims` by `check-shims` by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/706
* Bump Thor requirement by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/721
* Refactor DSL compilers by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/795
* Load nothing from Tapioca by default by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/821

### ✨ Enhancements

* Add `gems` as an alias to the `gem` command by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/720
* Generate `requires_ancestor` helpers in gems RBIs by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/728
* Expose DSL compiler test helper as a reusable unit by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/788
* Also generate Yard @annotations by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/803
* Update the strictness of generated RBI files in case of conflicts with DSL files by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/801
* Use RBI::Formatter by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/808
* Use root/absolute namespace in compiled RBI by @jeffcarbs in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/780

### 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Never generate `T.nilable(T.untyped)` in DSL generators by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/756
* In Ruby 2.6 `Symbol`s don't have `end_with?` method by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/763
* Fix printing or Yard @param annotations by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/807
* Handle attribute_method_matchers rename to attribute_method_patterns by @nvasilevski in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/811
* Implement support for final method signatures by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/771
* Fix path to DSL extensions by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/823

### 🛠 Other Changes

* Improve VSCode experience out of the box by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/757
* Update AASM DSL generator by @davebenvenuti in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/786

## New Contributors

* @nvasilevski made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/811
* @davebenvenuti made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/786

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.4
body:
## What's Changed

This minor release fixes a compatibility problem with latest Rails releases.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Handle `attribute_method_matchers` rename to `attribute_method_patterns` by @nvasilevski in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/commit/3ebb3dda999be1bcf2dd995b396712a5375947fc.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

This minor release fixes a compatibility problem with latest Sorbet releases and adds a missing Thor version dependency.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Bump Thor requirement by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/721
* Never generate `T.nilable(T.untyped)` in DSL generators by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/756

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3

name: v0.6.2
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.6.2 -->

## What's Changed

### ✨ Enhancements
* Support Ruby 3.1 by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/679
* Improve RequiresCompiler performance by @brasic in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/682
* RequiresCompiler: handle ruby source files with alternate encodings by @brasic in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/681
* Improve generic type variable tracking by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/701
* Add configuration validation by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/709
* Allow extended/included T::Props* to be present in .rbi by @CraigChilds94 in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/705

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Fix and improve method parameter sanitization by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/689
* Ignore interpolated strings in RequiresCompiler by @brasic in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/683
* Make generic AR column types `T.untyped` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/712

### 🛠 Other Changes
* Filter out Sorbet modules and modules that would be mixed in by other modules from dynamic extends by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/713

## New Contributors
* @brasic made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/682
* @ghiculescu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/695
* @CraigChilds94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/705

name: v0.6.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.6.1 -->

This is a quick bug-fix release for the 0.6 series

## What's Changed
### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Add typing for find_by! by @ryanwilsonperkin in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/675
* Fix various DSL compilers matching `XPath` by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/677
* Refactor how `SmartProperties` methods are generated by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/678


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.6.0 -->

## What's Changed

This is a major release on our path to releasing 1.0 version. It includes some headline features, like Active Record relation generation and doing parallel RBI generation (which really helps with `--doc` mode). But it also includes some breaking changes, especially around Tapioca [configuration](https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca#configuration).

If the addition of `ActiveRecordRelations` generator ends up creating too many errors in your code, you can always `--exclude ActiveRecordRelations` while migrating to this version and then clean up the errors later. The behaviour of other Active Record generators will change to reflect the fact that relations are not being generated.

### 🚧 Breaking Changes
* Refactor config infrastructure to be integrated with Thor by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/659

### ✨ Enhancements
* Parallelize the generation of RBI files by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/559
* Handle `frozen_record` scopes by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/565
* Add error message for missing `ActiveRecordAssociations` by @mutecipher in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/578
* Add `MissingConstantError` messaging by @mutecipher in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/584
* Merge generated RBIs with gem RBIs by @mojanjz in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/453
* Add a command to clean shim files automatically by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/641
* Add ActiveRecord relations generator by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/236
* Allow DSL generators to change behaviour based on if `ActiveRecordRelations` is enabled or not by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/660
* Make `init` create a skeleton Tapioca config by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/662
* Add support for Rails generators by @michaelherold in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/605

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Support `ActiveRecord::Enum` for abstract classes by @etiennebarrie in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/555
* Fix eval'ed constants not being generated in gem RBI generation by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/589
* Generate typed store accessors in their own module by @Morriar in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/587
* Exclude anonymous or value constants from DSL generation by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/595
* Sanitize type aliases by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/609
* Fix support for abstract singleton class methods by @mutecipher in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/615
* Remove stale gem rbis on generate by @vinistock in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/616
* Compare modules by identity for `Tapioca::Compilers::Dsl::Base#processable_constants` by @etiennebarrie in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/627
* Fix reflection target class existence check by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/634
* Properly load reflections for namespaced `has_many` relations by @jflinter in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/637
* Eager load constants registered for `autoload` after loading gems by @paracycle in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/639

### 🛠 Other Changes
* Move test helpers to `lib/tapioca` by @mutecipher in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/576

## New Contributors
* @etiennebarrie made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/555
* @ryanwilsonperkin made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/575
* @jflinter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/637
* @michaelherold made their first contribution in https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/605

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.5.4...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.6
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.5.6 -->
This is a bug-fix release from the 0.5 stable branch

## What's Changed

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Compare modules by identity for `Tapioca::Compilers::Dsl::Base#processable_constants`. #627 
* Remove stale gem RBIs on generate. #616 
* Fix support for abstract singleton class methods. #615 
* Sanitize type aliases. #609
* Exclude anonymous or value constants from DSL generation. #595

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.5.5...v0.5.6

name: v0.5.5
body:
## What's Changed

### 🚧 Breaking Changes
* Bump dependency versions to prepare for `requires_ancestor` change. #591
   **Note:** This means that, from this version on, Tapioca has a minimum dependency on Sorbet version `0.5.9204` released on October 06, 2021.

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
* The `doc` option should not have a default value. #566
* Support `ActiveRecord::Enum` for abstract classes. #555
* Fix eval'ed constants not being generated in gem RBI generation. #589
* Generate typed store accessors in their own module. #587

### 🛠 Other Changes
* Add pessimistic version dependencies on other Shopify gems. #633


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/compare/v0.5.4...v0.5.5

name: v0.5.4
body:
## 🐛 Bug Fixes
- Fixed a problem with generating RBI files for default gems (#562)

name: v0.5.3
body:
## ⚠️ Alerts

- Tapioca now requires a minimum Sorbet version of `0.5.6200` (released Jan 2020)

## ✨ Enhancements
- Add an option for adding documentation in generated gem RBI files (#479)
- Generate methods in gems for `class_attributes` inside `included` blocks of concerns (#515)
- [Active Record fixtures](https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/blob/main/manual/generator_activerecordfixtures.md) DSL generator (#491)
- [Mixed In Class Attributes](https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/blob/main/manual/generator_mixedinclassattributes.md) DSL generator (#528)
- [Active Model SecurePassword](https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/blob/main/manual/generator_activemodelsecurepassword.md) DSL generator (#550)

## 🧹 Changes
- Remove unparser as a direct dependency (#519)

name: v0.5.2
body:
## 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Load `ConstantLocator` early to make sure we don't misattribute constant locations (#493)
* Load Rails before requiring the `Gemfile`, which is needed for some gems to load properly (#500)

## ✨Enhancements
* Support modules that declare `SmartProperties` properties. (#502)

name: v0.4.27
body:
## 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Load `ConstantLocator` early to make sure we don't misattribute constant locations (#493)
* Load Rails before requiring the `Gemfile`, which is needed for some gems to load properly (#500)

name: v0.5.1
body:
## 🧹 Changes

* Bump `rbi` to v0.0.4
* Remove `rake` as a runtime dependency

name: v0.5.0
body:
This is quite a large release that changes many things (for the better, we hope):

## ⚠️ Alerts
* `sync` and `generate` commands have been deprecated and replaced by a single `gem` command. (#414)
* Support for Ruby 2.4 and 2.5 have been dropped. If you still need to use Tapioca on these Ruby versions, you will have to continue using the 0.4.x versions. (#339, #351)
* The API of DSL generators have changed slightly, so if you have custom DSL generators, you will need to upgrade them to the new syntax that uses the `RBI` gem instead of `Parlour`. (#388)
* Our main branch has been renamed to `main`.

## 🆕 New Features
* A new DSL generator for exposing nested `ActiveSupport::Concern` modules properly. (#360)
* A new DSL generator for the `Config` gem. (#372)
* A new DSL generator for `ActiveStorage`. (#416)
* A new DSL generator for `ActiveModel::Attributes`. (#419)
* A new DSL generator for `AASM`. (#463)
* Better generation for `mixes_in_class_modules` on Sorbet versions that support multiple arguments to it. (#363)
* DSL generators have built-in access to reflection helpers like `name_of`, `superclass_of`, etc and are advised to use them over calling the normal reflection methods. (#418, #481)

## 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Compile generic types in signatures using the correct constant (#412)
* Do not generate empty `ActiveJob` classes. (#345)
* Never sort mixed in modules, since include/extend order is important. (#392, #405)
* Properly root namespace `CollectionProxy` generic types. (#439) (thanks @fsateler)
* Make Tapioca work with Bundler 2.22.25+ (#446, #460)
* Tapioca no longer crashes if the target of helper method proxies do not exist. (#448)
* Rename Tapioca::Gemfile::Gem constant to Tapioca::Gemfile::GemSpec to prevent confusion with top-level Gem constant in generate RBI file for Tapioca itself (#475)
* Fix load ordering that would fail to autoload some constants from gems using Zeitwerk and implicit namespaces (#480)

## ✨Enhancements
* Enchaned support for better `IdentityCache` RBI generation with cache aliases support. (#369)
* If a job class has overridden Sidekiq methods, the `Sidekiq` generator does not generate them. (#482)
* Added `--verify` flag to `tapioca sync/gem`. (#364) (thanks @jeffcarbs)
* Added `--exclude-generators` flag to `tapioca dsl`. (#382) (thanks @jeffcarbs)
* Added `--file-header` flag to all `tapioca` commands to turn on/off the generated file header comment. (#389)
* Better file header comment for the `require.rb` generated by `tapioca require` command. (#344)
* Add `--verbose` flag to `tapioca dsl` to output which constant is being processed. (#402)
* Clean up flags to various `tapioca` commands. (#407)
* DSL generators are always run in alphabetical order to ensure include/extends are deterministic. (#478)

name: v0.4.26
body:
This is a bug-fix release that fixes an Tapioca RBI file issue and a load order problem

## 🐛  Fixes
- Rename `Tapioca::Gemfile::Gem` constant to `Tapioca::Gemfile::GemSpec` to prevent confusion with top-level `Gem` constant in generate RBI file for Tapioca itself (#475)
- Fix load ordering that would fail to autoload some constants from gems using Zeitwerk and implicit namespaces (#480)

name: v0.4.25
body:
This is a bug-fix release that fixes a Bundler compatibility issue

## 🐛  Fixes
- Make Tapioca work with Bundler 2.22.25+ (#446 , #460)

name: v0.4.24
body:
This is a bug-fix release that fixes an mixin ordering issues that was introduced by changes in 0.4.23

## 🐛  Fixes
- Never sort mixed in modules, since include/extend order is important (#392, #405)

name: v0.4.23
body:
This is a bug-fix release that fixes some issues that were introduced by changes in 0.4.22 and fixes a couple of other issues, as well.

## 🐛  Fixes
- Fix `ActiveJob` DSL RBI generator (#326)
- Fix `FixedHash` serialization so that it doesn't assume `Symbol` keys all the time (#327)
- Properly serialize generic types with missing type variables (#329)
- Generate proper gem RBI files for gems that are default gems (#330)
- Suppress call validation errors during CLI run (#331)

name: v0.4.22
body:
## Enhancements

- Rewrite RBI Generation for gems (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/297, https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/303)
- Generate private constant definitions (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/304)
- Generator for ActiveJob::Base descendants (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/298)
- Compile T.type_alias (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/291)


## Bug Fix
- Don't depend on Active Support for underscore method (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/307)
- Fix app cache folder source gems (https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/318)

name: v0.4.21
body:
## 🐛 Fixes
* Reverted verbose output https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/commit/86b4e821b3ae91ab4d19b677c634f1e556cb906e
* Fix for subclassing classes that have an inherited callback defined https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/commit/fa3c30b656a8c40045a2c91881c70d16b8f71bf2

## ✨Enhancements
* Enhanced `protobuf` support https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/commit/4c654e0074afc8b7220497efc36a9f058aba10d0

name: v0.4.20
body:
## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Improved Generics 
* Added `--quiet` flag for `dsl`
* Quieter output for `tapioca dsl --verify`

name: v0.4.19
body:
## 🐛 Bug fixes
* Better Generic instance creation https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/268
* Improved binstub creation output https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/267

name: v0.4.18
body:
## 🆕 New Features
* Better Generics support https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/156
* Added `--verify` flag to `tapioca dsl` https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/231
* `tapioca init` will now generate a binstub for your project  https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/259

## 🐛 Bug Fixes
* Internal gem types will no longer be exported https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/261
* RBI headers are now less dynamic and will cause less unnecessary file changes https://github.com/Shopify/tapioca/pull/259

## ⚠️ Alerts
* `-c`/`--cmd` flags have been deprecated and will be removed in a future release

name: v0.4.17
body: This is bug-fix release that fixes a regression that was introduced when adding `T::Enum` support [PR #253]

name: v0.4.16
body:
## New Features:

- Tapioca can now correctly generate `T::Enum` types using `enum do ... end` blocks in gem RBIs (thanks @jeffcarbs) [PR #243]
- DSL RBI generation operation will now clear dangling RBI files from the target directory. The operation keeps track of all DSL RBI files that already exist in the target directory and removes each file that has been regenerated from that list. Anything that is left behind at the end of the whole operation must be dangling RBI files that don't correspond to any live constants. Thus, those RBI files are deleted. [PR #244]
- You can now make Tapioca work with a custom Sorbet executable by setting the `TAPIOCA_SRB_PATH` environment variable (thanks @nathunsmitty) [PR #246]

## Fixes:

- Mixed in class methods detection for modules is best effort and never raises. [PR #252 - Fixes #237]
- Change loader behaviour to support pre-Rails 6 apps. [PR #251 - Fixes #239]

name: v0.1.1
body: - First production release. Matches feature set of `waffle-cone@0.12.0`

name: v0.1.0
body: Initial release 🎉
